channel.title: CVE Feed for Lenovo Group Ltd. -- Lenovo XClarity Administrator (LXCA)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lenovo Group Ltd. -- Lenovo XClarity Administrator (LXCA)

item.title: CVE-2017-3763|2024-08-05T14:39:41.044Z -- lenovo%20group%20ltd. -- lenovo%20xclarity%20administrator%20%28lxca%29
item.description: An attacker who obtains access to the location where the LXCA file system is stored may be able to access credentials of local LXCA accounts in LXCA versions earlier than 1.3.2.

item.title: CVE-2017-3770|2024-08-05T14:39:39.676Z -- lenovo%20group%20ltd. -- lenovo%20xclarity%20administrator%20%28lxca%29
item.description: Privilege escalation vulnerability in LXCA versions earlier than 1.3.2 where an authenticated user may be able to abuse certain web interface functionality to execute privileged commands within the underlying LXCA operating system.
